updates.title: Ancient Hunger Release Day Stream with the devs!
updates.content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/38ab379d0c2184bb853055f0086b6c0771a09d73.png Let's Play the New Ancient Hunger Mini Campaign with Camille, the Game Designer behind the update! Join the fun, ask your burning questions in the chat, win game keys, and take an exciting look at the future with an updated Kingdom Rush Alliance roadmap reveal. Don’t miss out—see you later, alligator! ANCIENT HUNGER FEATURES 🌿 3 Swamp-Smelling Stages 🐊 10 Ruthless New Enemies ⛓️ 1 Giant Menace of a Boss 🐸 1 New Ribbiting Tower 🐲 1 Unyielding New Hero 🏆 5 Shiny New Achievements https://store.steampowered.com/app/2849080/Kingdom_Rush_5_Alliance_TD/

updates.title: Updated Kingdom Rush Alliance Roadmap
updates.content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/032eb7fbeb44bac5b1d0761a0fc5166e38472917.png January: DLC Exclusive Campaign - What better resolution is there for New Year than playing more Kingdom Rush Alliance? The exclusive Campaign will feature five new stages, one hero, and one powerful tower to start your year with a bang. To Be Determined: FREE Mini Campaign - Epic New Mini Campaign, with 3 stages, 1 new hero, and 1 new tower! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2849080/Kingdom_Rush_5_Alliance_TD/ Plus even more content to come —we’ll keep you posted!

updates.title: Abominor Mechanics Update
updates.content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/b994b6107fff322d15fbcf7007ee422f86a339e7.jpg We’ve heard your feedback loud and clear, and we’re excited to share some changes we made to Abominor. Many of you raised concerns about its tower-destroying mechanic, and we’ve reworked it to make the encounter more balanced and rewarding. What's New? Abominor will no longer outright destroy towers. Instead, towers will now be reduced to rubble. You’ll have the option to repair these ruins, restoring your tower back to action—for a cost. This change keeps the tension high without feeling overly punishing. Additionally, Abominor’s stats have been adjusted to ensure a fair but challenging experience. Abominor's adjustments: Speed (across phases): Old: 22/19/14/10/7 New: 24/21/17/14/12 Restore HP on Phase Up: Old: 1700/2200/1700/2200 New: 1700/2200/1700/4000 Tower Eating Cooldown: Old: 12/12/18/18/20 New: 12/12/16/16/18 Thank you for your feedback and for helping us improve the game with every update. Try it out and...

updates.title: Bug Fixes Changelog
updates.content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/2b0bf39f89f2a40f6032ca291868a75f7f14e243.png Hello Generals! we wanted to let you know that we have several bug fixes. Changelog: Fixed Rocket Gunners Missile crash Fixed Dante and Demon Pit's damage types Fixed several chinese localization texts Balanced SFXs on stage 24 We are still working on fixing the timing of the opening of the foot in stage 1, and some further rebalancing of the dlc. If you still experience any issues, please comment in this discussion as we will be taking a close look at the comments. Thank you so much for your patience and helping us improve the game! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3368630/Kingdom_Rush_5_Alliance_TD__Colossal_Dwarfare_Campaign/

updates.title: Balance Patch: Buffs to Towers, Heroes, and Enemies
updates.content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/42cd51c27270295e13036f570743a30968692584.png Hello Generals! As promised, we are making a big set of balance changes to Kingdom Rush Alliance. You’ll notice we’ve buffed up the weaker towers and heroes, while some Colossal Dwarfare enemies have been strengthened mostly on Impossible difficulty. Full changelog: Towers Dwarven Flamespitter: Can now target flying enemies Brewmasters: Halfdan attack speed buffed 1.5 sec -> 1 sec Necromancer: Basic skeleton now has 50 HP (from 40) and 3-5 damage (from 1-4). Golem has 150 HP (from 120) and 8-12 dmg (from 6-10). Cooldown for Rattling Beacon was reduced in levels 1 and 2 Elven Stargazer: fixed attack rate change bug between some upgrades, Reload Damage increased from 4-6/10-16/20-28/32-48 to 4-6/11-18/22-32/34-52 Event Horizon Cost decreased from 250/150/150 to 250/100/100 Rising Star Damage increased from 16-24/28-42/36-54 to 18-30/28-42/36-54 Rising Star Range increased from 120 to 200 Rising Star Stun increased f...

2024-10-02_Release Stream with.title: Release Stream with the Devs!
positive_examples: 塔防游戏的标杆，王国保卫战系列的最新作，在如今的购买力下，这是非常划算的一款游戏，两杯星巴克的钱，就能体验一款制作精良，玩法独树一帜的休闲游戏，遗憾的是游戏流程目前偏短，产能感人，这系列前作还爱出付费更新，喜欢塔防并有经济条件的值得一玩。
支持铁皮，从4399到手游再到Steam，KR的陪伴让我收获了相当多的快乐，塔防巅峰神作实至名归
negative_examples:
Très bon Kingdom Rush avec une grande diversité d'options de jeu.

Hâte de voir plus de contenu additionnel étoffer le jeu d'avantage.
its fun, but its also very short
Nagyon Tetszik a játék. Szerintem jó az ötlet, hogy az előző játékokban megismert hősök, ellenségek összefognak egy nagyobb gonosz ellen, amit az építhető tornyok és játszható hősök is mutatnak.
2024-10-02_Release Stream with.update_content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/936229877c3a4177e19a619ff01251730e560c0f.png Join Alliance devs as they play the new Undying Fury Mini Campaign live! 2024-12-03_Ancient Hunger Relea.title: Ancient Hunger Release Day Stream with the devs!
positive_examples: 还挺喜欢这部的 很好玩 双英雄还挺好的 英雄前期小树灵是最好用的 再加一个定点站位的英雄 但后期那肯定就是两条龙了 死灵法师塔是真的全能 伤害防空拦截加一条路的伤害 目前流程太短了 完全不够玩 超级期待后续内容 铁皮收到火速更新！
negative_examples:
Para ser la quinta entrega de una aclamada saga de tower defence, debo de admitir que tiene mecanicas revolucionarias que podrian considerarla uno de los mejores Kingdom Rush. Tener dos heroes en batalla, y cinco torres de alguna de las dos facciones es una excelente tematica y forma de introducir nuevas formas de juego, donde puedes hacer una mezcla de ambos bandos o alinearte mas para uno, Los niveles y enemigos estan muy bien ambientados y hechos, e incluso la pelea de el jefe final es extremadamente buena y original. Las torres y heroes son una combinacion de nuevos personajes con algunos de antiguas entregas, e incluso expandiendo sus futuros luego de sus respectivos tiempos.
Recomiendo mucho este juego de Kingdom Rush, tiene una buena dinamica muy original y abierta para todos, donde incluso podemos elegir un bando que mas nos agrade.
能不能改改你那龙族的祖传弱索敌，这次木龙简直集大分之成者，远的不大、近的不打、脚底的不打，还有boss 除了拆塔就想不出其他机制了？

2024-12-09_Updated Kingdom Rush.title: Updated Kingdom Rush Alliance Roadmap
positive_examples: 很经典的塔防游戏，喜欢
negative_examples: 好玩爱玩，一到五全入库

Amo muito essa franquia, as fases são muito bem equilibradas e gostei das torres novas também, só achei os herois que são de dano magico mais fracos que os de dano fisico, mas mesmo assim esse jogo é um deleite para quem gosta de tower defense, recomendo.
Well if you love Kingdom rush series, this nobrainer, not to mention this is dirt cheap compare to mobile version if you wanna have all the heroes and towers (with slower release that is).

2025-01-15_Abominor Mechanics U.title: Abominor Mechanics Update
positive_examples:
Toujours très beaux graphiquement.
Plaisant à découvrir, peut-être trop facile même en impossible.
Les tours avec unités moins efficaces de les précédents opus, ce n'est pas plus mal.

Il manque toujours un mode multi-joueurs.
已经通关了，游戏本身和前面几代没太大区别，英雄、防御塔、套路都差不多。喜欢这个类型的当打发时间玩玩是没问题的，但是~~这游戏售价太贵了，关卡本身不算多，流程也不长。打包DLC一起买100多确实太贵了，打五折可以买。
negative_examples: DLC 20多？过年发红包了使劲薅是吧？脸都不要了
不错，防御塔平衡性有待加强，量有点小

2025-02-05_Bug Fixes Changelog.title: Bug Fixes Changelog
positive_examples: 最新的DLC让我最惊喜的是，对于BOSS鳄鱼的处理，有一种打王国保卫战1的最终BOSS卫兹南那样的压迫感，真的感觉到这款游戏一直在挖寻新的东西谋求进步，这么多年了真的respect♥
negative_examples:
Как по мне часть не доделанная, но ее спасают новые мини кампании, в длс пока не играл, но игру прошел на 70/70 достижений(не считая нового длс), мб завтра куплю длс и попробую, не испортит ли он мое впечетление.
As far as I'm concerned, the part is unfinished, but it's being saved by new mini-campaigns, I haven't played the DLC yet, but I've passed the game for 70/70 achievements (not counting the new dlc), and tomorrow I'll buy a dlc and see if it spoils my impression.

So not worth the money for many of the reasons already stated. Beautiful artwork, some new towers, pretty cool. But sort of a rework of KR2. Here, they artificially increase the difficulty by adding a great many "dual path" scenarios. Their last couple games had some, and it was ok, but this game seems to depend on dual path to increase difficulty instead of using ingenuity.
